attributes.action: Force Boris Johnson to Reinstate Ray Lewis back to Deputy Mayor for Young People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ray Lewis has been subject to a vile smear campaign but the left-wing press and as a result has been forced to step down. Irrelevant of what he has or has not done in his past Ray I believe is one of the best people to sort out the crime that is rife on our streets and  now that chance has been taken away. 

Please sign this petition if you want to see him back where he belongs.

rejection.details: This is a local matter and should be directed to the London Assembly as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
